"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551ddff2636872520c4f0700#post_551ddff2636872520c4f0700
[bq="uc9"]
*IF* that radio wave does turn out to be aliens for real how would you react to it?[/bq]
-ayy lmao- 
It wouldn't really shock me. It'd be nice to have evidence that we're not alone, but i've pretty much suspected that all along. In a universe this size, it'd be damn strange if only this planet had life growing on it.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551de0ec6368725429ca0400#post_551de0ec6368725429ca0400
I don't think it would matter very much, because even if was from aliens, there's a good chance they're probably long-dead by the time their signal reached us. And even if they weren't, the distance between Earth and wherever the signal came from is so inconceivably vast that there's no way we would ever meet them (or that they would meet us) within this lifetime.

topics.body: [bq="Tom Gabriel Fischer"]I was approached last year by one of the museum's paleonotlogists who informed me that it had been suggested to name a fossil after me, and that the naming could be celebrated by means of an event during which I would be handed a model of the fossil and Triptykon would perform at the museum, on top of the fossil display cases. We subsequently met the paleonotlogist when Triptykon played Bern late last year. He was a very pleasant, courteous, and intelligent individual, and he explained that he was part of a group of scientists who named fossils after artists they admired (e.g. King Diamond, Lemmy, etc.). [/bq]this is so silly
topics.author: 50a843d47f123b2e7c001359

topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551de3466368725429130700#post_551de3466368725429130700
My existence will never be the same again.

Seriously, legit first contact or discovery of any alien life will shake up society like crazy. If there's anything speculative fiction has taught us, is that discovery of alien life and/or first contact will be a really great thing or a really terrible thing.

I'm hoping for something like Mass Effect, except take out the looming threat of the Reapers. At least that kind of setting fits a somewhat realistic approach to something quite fantastic.
